name: block-explorer
title: Block Explorer
description: Quickly search block explorers for transactions, addresses, and blocks.
author: nathan_schwermann

commands.name: block-explorer-cmd
commands.title: Block Explorer
commands.subtitle: Search EVM block explorers
commands.description: Quickly search block explorers for transactions, addresses, and blocks.

arguments.name: query
arguments.placeholder: Enter address, transaction hash, or block number
arguments.description: The query to search for on block explorers (e.g., address, transaction hash, block number).

arguments.name: chain
arguments.description: The blockchain to search on (e.g., eth, bsc).
